name: Steak lettuce cups
description: Rustle up these easy steak canapés to serve at a party. With two sauces to accompany them, they're delicious and healthy too
keywords: Canapés, Chimichurri, Hors douvres, Lettuce, Party, Sophie Godwin, Steak
recipeIngredients: ½ tbsp cold pressed rapeseed oil
½ tbsp cold pressed rapeseed oil

recipeInstructions.text: Take the steak out of the fridge 30 mins ahead of frying it. Mix the chimichurri ingredients with 1 tbsp water, season and set aside. Mix the ingredients for the chilli & lime sauce and set aside. Separate the Baby Gem lettuces so you have 20 leaves (‘cups’).

Heat a non-stick frying pan over a medium-high heat. Coat the steak in the oil, season, then fry for 2-3 mins on each side. Set aside for 10 mins, then cut into 20 slices. Place a steak strip on each cup. To serve, top half with the chimichurri and half with the chilli & lime sauce.
